product_name: The North Face Torrent 12 Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz.
long_description: The North Face Torrent 12 hydration pack features a large, straightforward design with ample features and enough space for all-day adventures. Comfortable shoulder straps and vented back panel offer all-day comfort; webbing hipbelt adds stability. Innovative "doughnut" reservoir features a hole in the middle that enhances ventilation and helps prevent bulging. Fleece-lined media pocket provides a cozy nest for your smart phone or music player. The North Face Torrent 12 hydration pack has a stash pocket and attachment points for a helmet and trekking poles on the front panel.
short_description: The North Face Torrent 12 hydration pack features a large, straightforward design with ample features and enough space for all-day adventures.
